original: Andersson, Anders, direktör, Linköping, f. 27/5/94 i Rättvik, Kopparb. 1., av hemm:äg. Pellas Anders Jonsson o. Kerstin Hansson. G. 26 m. Gunni Svensson. Barn: Kerstin Maria f. 27, John Anders Gunnar 30. — CTI (E) 16-19. . Offert- o. montageing. v. Elektr. A-B Christian Bergh i Malmö 19-20, bitr. ing. v. Trollhätte kraftv. distr :kont. 20-21, distrib :ing. v. Linköp. elverk 22-25, driftsing. där 25 o. verkst. dir. f. Linköp. Elektr. Kraft-& Belysn. A-B sed. 44. Led. av styr. f. A-B Nya Centr:brygg. sed. 33, v. ordf. sed. 44, huv:man i Linköp. Sparbank sed. 42, led. av styr. f. Linköp. Omnibusbol. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören.
translated: Andersson, Anders, director, Linköping, b. May 27, 1894 in Rättvik, Kopparberg County, son of home owner Pellas Anders Jonsson and Kerstin Hansson. Married Gunni Svensson on May 26. Children: Kerstin Maria born in 1927, John Anders Gunnar born in 1930. CTI (E) 16-19. Offer and installation engineer at Elektr. A-B Christian Bergh in Malmö from 1919-1920, assistant engineer at Trollhätte power district office from 1920-1921, distribution engineer at Linköping power station from 1922-1925, operations engineer there from 1925 and managing director of Linköping Elektr. Kraft- & Belysn. A-B since 1944. Member of the board of A-B Nya Centr:brygg. since 1933, vice chairman since 1944, main officer of Linköping Sparbank since 1942, member of the board of Linköping Omnibusbol. Member of the Swedish technical association.
